TABLE_OID.@title: TABLE_OID: Object ID of the table

FIXED_PART_SIZE.@title: FIXED_PART_SIZE: Fixed part size of the table

IS_LOGGED.@title: IS_LOGGED: Specifies whether or not logging was on for the table at last restart time: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

IS_SYSTEM_TABLE.@title: IS_SYSTEM_TABLE: Specifies whether the table is a system table: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

IS_COLUMN_TABLE.@title: IS_COLUMN_TABLE: Specifies whether the table is a column table: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

TABLE_TYPE.@title: TABLE_TYPE: Specifies type of the table: 'ROW'/'COLUMN'/'VIRTUAL'/'EXTENDED'/'COLLECTION'

IS_INSERT_ONLY.@title: IS_INSERT_ONLY: Deprecated: will not be set any more

IS_TEMPORARY.@title: IS_TEMPORARY: Specifies whether the table is a temporary table: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

COMMIT_ACTION.@title: COMMIT_ACTION: On commit deletion for global temporary tables

IS_USER_DEFINED_TYPE.@title: IS_USER_DEFINED_TYPE: 'TRUE' if user defined table type, 'FALSE' otherwise

HAS_PRIMARY_KEY.@title: HAS_PRIMARY_KEY: 'TRUE' if the table has a primary key, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

USES_EXTKEY.@title: USES_EXTKEY: 'TRUE' if the table uses an external key, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

AUTO_MERGE_ON.@title: AUTO_MERGE_ON: 'TRUE' if automatic delta table merge is activated for the table, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

USES_DIMFN_CACHE.@title: USES_DIMFN_CACHE: 'TRUE' if DimFunctionCache feature is used by the table, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

IS_PUBLIC.@title: IS_PUBLIC: 'TRUE' if the table is public, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

AUTO_OPTIMIZE_COMPRESSION_ON.@title: AUTO_OPTIMIZE_COMPRESSION_ON: 'TRUE' if automatic optimize compression is activated for the table, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

COMPRESSED_EXTKEY.@title: COMPRESSED_EXTKEY: 'TRUE' if the table uses a compressed external key, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

HAS_TEXT_FIELDS.@title: HAS_TEXT_FIELDS: 'TRUE' if the table has at least one column of type TEXT, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

USES_QUEUE_TABLE.@title: USES_QUEUE_TABLE: 'TRUE' if the table uses a queue table, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

IS_PRELOAD.@title: IS_PRELOAD: 'TRUE' if the table uses preloading, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

IS_PARTIAL_PRELOAD.@title: IS_PARTIAL_PRELOAD: 'TRUE' if the table uses partial preloading, else 'FALSE'. Only valid for column store tables

UNLOAD_PRIORITY.@title: UNLOAD_PRIORITY: Specifies unload priority of the table: 0 - 9. 0 means not unloadable, 1 means latest unload, and 9 means earliest unload

IS_REPLICA.@title: IS_REPLICA: 'TRUE' if the table is a replica, else 'FALSE'

HAS_STRUCTURED_PRIVILEGE_CHECK.@title: HAS_STRUCTURED_PRIVILEGE_CHECK: 'TRUE' if the table is registered for structured privilege check, else 'FALSE'

ROW_ORDER_TYPE.@title: ROW_ORDER_TYPE: Row order type: NULL/'BY VALUE'

HAS_MASKED_COLUMNS.@title: HAS_MASKED_COLUMNS: 'TRUE' if the table has a MASK definition for at least one column, else 'FALSE'

MASK_MODE.@title: MASK_MODE: Specifies the mask mode 'DEFAULT'/'SESSION USER' to be applied if the table has masked columns, otherwise 'NULL'

PERSISTENT_MEMORY.@title: PERSISTENT_MEMORY: 'TRUE' if the table has Persistent Memory preference ON, 'FALSE' if table Persistent Memory preference is OFF

HAS_RECORD_COMMIT_TIMESTAMP.@title: HAS_RECORD_COMMIT_TIMESTAMP: Specifies whether the table is tracking commit timestamps of records: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

IS_REPLICATION_LOG_ENABLED.@title: IS_REPLICATION_LOG_ENABLED: Specifies whether the table's replication log is collected or not: 'TRUE'/'FALSE'

NUMA_NODE_INDEXES.@title: NUMA_NODE_INDEXES: Comma separated list of ranges of user specified logical NUMA node indexes

IS_MOVABLE.@title: IS_MOVABLE: 'TRUE' if table is movable, else 'FALSE'

LOAD_UNIT.@title: LOAD_UNIT: Specifies unit of table data loading: 'TABLE'/'COLUMN'/'PAGE'/'DEFAULT'
